topic.title: Site search?
topic.body: Is there any way to search through one site? For example I want to search through this forum (ZeroTalk) but I don't found any search field. Kaffiene is a search engine for searching, but I'm not sure if it search all plain text in all site on ZeroNet.

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: **bold** *italic* underline? ~~linethrough~~ `code` # h1 ## h2 ### h3 - ol - ol - ol level2? [external link - google](https://www.google.com) [internal link - Chinese forum](http://127.0.0.1:43110/NewGFWTalk.bit/?Topic:6_1Q7UWk3im88kJkzmhzfD5q44rQDXLatxYq) [Image on zeroblog](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/data/img/post_103_publish.png) [image on www](https://images.duckduckgo.com/iu/?u=https%3A%2F%2Ftse2.mm.bing.net%2Fth%3Fid%3DOIP.Md61eabf0d53af4e314e36184906b08e1o0%26pid%3D15.1&f=1) ![Why img don't work?](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj/Test+messages) ``` code block with multiple lines ```
